author: Domenic Mastromatteo
title: Exam invigilation question
question:
I have been using my desktop computer to do all the coding for this class so far but it does not have a camera.
Would it be possible to join zoom on my laptop but take the exam on my desktop? This would leave me unable to "screen share" but i would be able to turn my laptop around if you wanted to take a look at my desktop screens.
student_answer:
“You may run Zoom on the same computer you are using to run Dr. Racket, or you may use another computer or a cell phone or a tablet that Zoom runs on acceptably.”
-@313
